value.description: A medium-sized tree that produces cashew nuts. Its seeds grow outside the fruit, making it a unique and valuable crop.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Cashew trees grow 30% faster in equatorial regions. The size of the equatorial region depends on the planet's overall temperature: below 15º for Normal, below 35º for Warm, below 65º for Hot and all the planet for Very Hot. Planets with below Normal temperature are considered to have no equator.

A tropical tree known for its large, spiky fruit. Durian trees thrive in hot, humid climates and are famous for their unique, pungent-smelling fruit.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Durian trees grow 30% faster in equatorial regions. The size of the equatorial region depends on the planet's overall temperature: below 15º for Normal, below 35º for Warm, below 65º for Hot and all the planet for Very Hot. Planets with below Normal temperature are considered to have no equator.

The Jabuticaba tree produces small, dark purple fruit that grows directly on its trunk. The fruit is sweet and tangy, used in jams and beverages. It thrives in warm climates and is cultivated for its unique fruit.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Jabuticaba trees grow 30% faster in equatorial regions. The size of the equatorial region depends on the planet's overall temperature: below 15º for Normal, below 35º for Warm, below 65º for Hot and all the planet for Very Hot. Planets with below Normal temperature are considered to have no equator.

A tropical tree with large, broad leaves that produces sweet, orange flesh fruit. Papaya trees grow well in warm, humid climates and require plenty of sunlight.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Papaya trees grow 30% faster in equatorial regions. The size of the equatorial region depends on the planet's overall temperature: below 15º for Normal, below 35º for Warm, below 65º for Hot and all the planet for Very Hot. Planets with below Normal temperature are considered to have no equator.

A small, drought-tolerant tree that produces bright red, leathery fruits filled with juicy seeds. Pomegranate trees thrive in warm, Mediterranean climates.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Pomegranate trees show a marked preference for rocky soils, flourishing in them.

A slow-growing coniferous tree that produces pine nuts, found in temperate and Mediterranean climates.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Stone pine trees show a marked preference for rocky soils, flourishing in them.
